name: Run, Robot, Run!
description:
Help the tiny robot avoid obstacles and reach the finishing line before the time runs out!

***

CONTROLS

-A-D to move

-W to jump

-LEFT and RIGHT ARROWS to create boxes

-TAB to pause

***

I made this game in 7 days for the "Indie Game Dev Beginners #003" game jam (theme "robots"), that was actually my first game jam. 

Hope you have fun!

zarkgames
